It's safe to say that the most important thing we'll do this April is celebrate the generosity and compassion we personally experienced after the tragedy of the bombings at the Boston Marathon on April 15th, 2013 by paying it forward to those less fortunate.

Please join us for a little spring closet cleaning as we collect items for the marlo marketing 2nd Annual @[664381273754043:844:One Boston Day 2017] Clothing Drive. We'll be collecting gently-worn clothing, shoes and accessories to benefit our friends at @[59683197956:274:Goodwill Boston]

Start collecting your gently worn men's & women's clothing, shoes and accessories for our 2nd annual @[148311435692661:844:One Boston Day 2017] clothing drive to benefit @[59683197956:274:Goodwill Boston]!

You'll be helping to provide interview-appropriate and business casual apparel to low-income men and women who are entering the workforce. These individuals are graduates of Goodwill and other Boston-based job training programs and need our assistance in making the right impression on interviews and at their jobs.

Stop by our office anytime between April 10-18 and join us in celebrating resilience of all kinds!
